name: Pony Injury Treatment - Pony See A Doctor
name_original: Pony Injury Treatment - Pony See A Doctor
description: Big winter, snowing , Pony happily skiing. Suddenly, an avalanche occurred. Worse, Pony was drowned in snow. Well, Pony was injured, so sad sad, still shaking, how to do it, have to hurry to cure it, you will? Will you help the wounded baby pony treatment? Let her restore healthy and happy.
